body.name: Kristin Ess Hair The One Signature Conditioner for Dry Damaged Hair - Moisturizes, Smooths, Detangles + Softens Hair Hydrates + Repairs - Vegan, Paraben Free + Color Safe
body.stockDetail: Only 5 left in stock - order soon.
features: "The thing I love about this formula most is that it gets your hair super clean but also leaves it feeling moisturized and looking shiny. It's hard to find a shampoo, particularly a sulfate-free shampoo, that does both really well" - Kristin Ess

Cleanse + Condition: A clean, well-conditioned canvas is essential. These universal, sulfate-free products cleanse + deeply condition to leave hair feeling moisturized, full and looking shiny from root to tip.
For all hair types, Weightlessly moisturizing, Smoothing + softening, Shine renewing, Sulfate-free

How To: After shampooing + rinsing, depending on the thickness of your hair, squeeze a dime to quarter-sized amount into your palm. On wet hair, apply from the bottom and work your way to the top, skipping the last inch or two near the root. Wait 3 minutes, then rinse thoroughly.
Cruelty free, color safe, free of sulfates, parabens + phthalates
Known for its notable good smelling Pear + Sandalwood + Magnolia fragrance that lasts all day. Great color safe shampoo and conditioner set.
body.description: Contains Zip-Up Technology™ our proprietary strengthening complex designed to “zip-up” split ends while targeting weak areas of the hair, smoothing the appearance of damaged cuticles and helping to protect hair from environmental stressors and color fade.

One Signature Shampoo One Signature Conditioner Weightless Shine Leave-In Conditioner Weightless Shine Air Dry Crème Routine cleanse condition detangle style Benefits moisturizing, softening + shine enhancing hydrating + weightlessly moisturizing moisture sealing, softening + strengthening frizz calming, smoothing + softening How to Use Apply to wet hair, massaging into the scalp to create a rich lather. Rinse clean. After cleansing, apply to hair. Wait 3 minutes. Rinse thoroughly. While hair is still completely wet, apply 5-10 sprays all over your hair. When hair is halfway dry, work cream through hair and allow it to finish air drying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing shampoo and conditioner
reviews.reviewText: This shampoo and conditioner is amazing!! It makes my hair very manageable and soft. No more frizzies!! It also smells SOOOOOOOO GOOD!! The scent is a HUGE selling point for me!!! I’m so glad I found it!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love This Shampoo
reviews.reviewText: Although this is a little bit more expensive than your run of the mill value shampoo, there is definitely a reason behind it. Not only is the scent great, but it definitely helps get my hair clean, reduce grease, and increase the feel to my hair for a few days. I was having an issue with my hair getting too greasy almost the next day after washing it. After trying multiple different shampoos I decided to give this one a try and I'm happy to say I think I have found the shampoo for me. If you're looking for a quality shampoo to give it a chance, I would recommend you give this one a try!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was just sick of my old shampoo and something I was looking for was sulfate free shampoo. This shampoo looked cute so and had some really good ingredients for hair so I tried it out. It is AMAZING!! I absolutely love the smell and the way it makes my head feel so refreshed. Not only does it have great quality ingredients, I love how it smells and feels. The cap on it is also amazing. Shampoos and conditioners tend to break and get gross in the shower but the way they made these are super durable and easy to use!! They are a little bit small but I didn’t have to use as much as I normally do because a little went a long way! Great product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Scent is nice but strong
reviews.reviewText: The scent is overpowering, especially if you’re sensitive to smells. It’s not bad, just very strong. I used the shampoo and conditioner once. The product itself is fine but all I could smell all day was my hair, like someone sprayed perfume in my hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Smells amazing, leaves hair feeling light fluffy bouncy and voluminous! Hair lasts for about 3 days before I need to wash it again. This is a clarifying shampoo so I don’t use it every wash. I use it about every 3rd wash. Keeps my hair squeaky clean and with tons of volume! Hair will smell great for days!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works and smells great
reviews.reviewText: First time using this brand and I like it so far. Smells good and my hair has felt smooth. Good price compared to other stores of this product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Decent Shampoo and Conditioner Set
reviews.reviewText: I recently tried the Kristin Ess Hydrating Signature Sulfate-Free Salon Shampoo and Conditioner Set, and I have mixed feelings about it.On the positive side, the bottles look sleek and the packaging is attractive. The scent is pleasant, not too overpowering, and it lingers in your hair for a while after use, which I personally like. The sulfate-free formula is gentle on my hair and scalp, and I appreciate that it doesn't strip my hair of its natural oils.However, when it comes to performance, I found this set to be just okay. The shampoo lathers well, but I felt that it left my hair feeling a bit heavy and not as clean as I would have liked. The conditioner, while it has a nice texture, didn't seem to do a great job of detangling my hair, which was disappointing.In terms of hydration, I didn't notice a significant change in the overall moisture of my hair. I have naturally dry hair, and this set didn't seem to provide the deep hydration it claims. I had to use additional leave-in products to achieve the level of softness and manageability I desired.The price point is on the higher side for a drugstore brand, and I was hoping for better results given the cost. I've used other hydrating shampoos and conditioners that performed better at a similar or even lower price point.In conclusion, the Kristin Ess Hydrating Signature Sulfate-Free Salon Shampoo and Conditioner Set is decent, but it didn't quite meet my expectations in terms of hydration and overall performance. While it has some positive qualities, I may consider trying other products for better results in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Took multiple tries, but I have finally found a shampoo I love on Amazon! Kristen Ess' Signature Shampoo & Conditioner really is "The One!" The shampoo lathers up so well, and you really only need a small amount. I'm used to needing 3 tablespoons of shampoo to get a full lather, and with this shampoo you only need a tablespoon - maybe even less if you have shorter hair. The conditioner is nice too and my hair is soft, with little to no fly-aways - even in the dry winter air. I would have given this all 5 stars, but the smell is only so-so. If they came up with a nice fragrance this shampoo would be unmatched! One last point, I love the small compact bottle size. My shower is small so I don't have a lot of room for massive bottles. Don't let the small bottle size fool you. Because you only need a small amount of shampoo & conditioner this is still a very good value. I will be buying this product again, and in fact, this may be my go-to product of choice!

Product arrived leaking. Amazon won’t replace it refund as they say it’s Kristin Ess responsibility. Kristin Ess won’t replace or refund as they say it’s amazons responsibility.Avoid this headache and buy something else.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Would definitely repurchase this.I have a keratin treatment on my hair and cannot use shampoos with salts and sulphates, however it can be difficult to find clarifying shampoos without those ingredients.This leaves my hair completely clean and soft and removes all build up.
